actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

official_title: A bill to ensure that certain loan programs of the Small Business Administration are made available to cannabis-related legitimate businesses and service providers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fair Access for Cannabis Small Businesses Act

summary.text:
Fair Access for Cannabis Small Businesses Act

This bill prohibits the Small Business Administration from declining to provide certain loans or other assistance to an otherwise eligible small business solely because the business is a cannabis-related legitimate business or service provider.

titles.title: Fair Access for Cannabis Small Businesses Act
Fair Access for Cannabis Small Businesses Act
A bill to ensure that certain loan programs of the Small Business Administration are made available to cannabis-related legitimate businesses and service providers, and for other purposes.
